00100 typedef struct {
00101   double Xcm[3];
00102   double q[9];
00103 } quadrupolepara;

00105 
00106 static void ob_quadrupole(const double* Xcm,
00107                           const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00108                           const GaussianAux* X, 
00109                           complex double q[9])
00110 {
00111   int i,j;
00112   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00113 
00114   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00115     rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00116 
00117   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00118     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00119       q[i+j*3] += 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00120 
00121     q[j+j*3] += - rho2cm* X->Q; 
00122   }
00123 }
00124

00126 static void ob_equadrupole(const double* Xcm,
00127                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00128                            const GaussianAux* X, 
00129                            complex double q[9])
00130 {
00131   int i,j;
00132   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00133 
00134   if (G1->xi == 1) {
00135 
00136     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00137       rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00138 
00139     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00140       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00141         q[i+j*3] += 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00142 
00143       q[j+j*3] += - rho2cm* X->Q; 
00144     }
00145   }     
00146 }

00149 static void ob_nquadrupole(const double* Xcm,
00150                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00151                            const GaussianAux* X, 
00152                            complex double q[9])
00153 {
00154   int i,j;
00155   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00156 
00157   if (G1->xi == -1) {
00158 
00159     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00160       rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00161 
00162     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00163       for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00164         q[i+j*3] += 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00165 
00166       q[j+j*3] += - rho2cm* X->Q; 
00167     }
00168   }     
00169 }

00172 static void ob_quadrupoleoffd(const double* Xcm,
00173                               const Gaussian*G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00174                               const GaussianAux* X, 
00175                               complex double q[9])
00176 {
00177   int i,j;
00178 
00179   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00180     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00181       if (i!=j)
00182         q[i+j*3] += 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00183   }
00184 }

00186 
00187 static void gob_quadrupole(quadrupolepara* q2par,
00188                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00189                            const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00190                            complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00191 {
00192   double* Xcm = q2par->Xcm;
00193   double* q=q2par->q;
00194   int i,j, k;
00195   complex double merr;
00196   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00197   gradGaussian drho2cm;
00198 
00199   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00200     rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00201 
00202   drho2cm.a = 0.0;
00203   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00204     drho2cm.a += 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[i];
00205   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00206     drho2cm.b[i] = 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b;
00207 
00208   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00209     for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00210 
00211       merr = 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j]);
00212       
00213       *q2 += q[i+j*3]* merr *X->Q;
00214 
00215       for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00216         dq2->chi[k] +=  q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00217       dq2->a += q[i+j*3]*
00218         (3*(dX->drho.a[i]*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])+(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[j])*X->Q+
00219          merr* dX->dQ.a);
00220       dq2->b[i] += q[i+j*3]*
00221         3*dX->drho.b*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00222       dq2->b[j] += q[i+j*3]*
00223         3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b*X->Q;
00224       for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00225         dq2->b[k] += q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00226     }
00227 
00228     merr = rho2cm;
00229 
00230     *q2 += - q[j+j*3]* merr* X->Q;
00231 
00232     for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00233       dq2->chi[k] += - q[j+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00234     dq2->a += - q[j+j*3]* (drho2cm.a* X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.a);
00235     for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00236       dq2->b[k] += - q[j+j*3]* 
00237         (drho2cm.b[k]*X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.b[k]);
00238   }
00239 }

00242 static void gob_equadrupole(quadrupolepara* q2par,
00243                             const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00244                             const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00245                             complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00246 {       
00247   double* Xcm = q2par->Xcm;
00248   double* q=q2par->q;
00249   int i,j, k;
00250   complex double merr;
00251   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00252   gradGaussian drho2cm;
00253 
00254   if (G1->xi == 1) {
00255 
00256     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00257       rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00258 
00259     drho2cm.a = 0.0;
00260     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00261       drho2cm.a += 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[i];
00262     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00263       drho2cm.b[i] = 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b;
00264 
00265     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00266       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00267 
00268         merr = 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j]);
00269       
00270         *q2 += q[i+j*3]* merr *X->Q;
00271 
00272         for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00273           dq2->chi[k] +=  q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00274         dq2->a += q[i+j*3]*
00275           (3*(dX->drho.a[i]*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])+(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[j])*X->Q+
00276            merr* dX->dQ.a);
00277         dq2->b[i] += q[i+j*3]*
00278           3*dX->drho.b*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00279         dq2->b[j] += q[i+j*3]*
00280           3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b*X->Q;
00281         for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00282           dq2->b[k] += q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00283       }
00284 
00285       merr = rho2cm;
00286 
00287       *q2 += - q[j+j*3]* merr* X->Q;
00288 
00289       for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00290         dq2->chi[k] += - q[j+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00291       dq2->a += - q[j+j*3]* (drho2cm.a* X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.a);
00292       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00293         dq2->b[k] += - q[j+j*3]* 
00294           (drho2cm.b[k]*X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.b[k]);
00295     }
00296   }
00297 }

00300 static void gob_nquadrupole(quadrupolepara* q2par,
00301                             const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00302                             const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00303                             complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00304 {       
00305   double* Xcm = q2par->Xcm;
00306   double* q=q2par->q;
00307   int i,j, k;
00308   complex double merr;
00309   complex double rho2cm = 0.0;
00310   gradGaussian drho2cm;
00311 
00312   if (G1->xi == -1) {
00313 
00314     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00315       rho2cm += csqr(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i]);
00316 
00317     drho2cm.a = 0.0;
00318     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00319       drho2cm.a += 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[i];
00320     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00321       drho2cm.b[i] = 2*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b;
00322 
00323     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00324       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00325 
00326         merr = 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j]);
00327       
00328         *q2 += q[i+j*3]* merr *X->Q;
00329 
00330         for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00331           dq2->chi[k] +=  q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00332         dq2->a += q[i+j*3]*
00333           (3*(dX->drho.a[i]*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])+(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[j])*X->Q+
00334            merr* dX->dQ.a);
00335         dq2->b[i] += q[i+j*3]*
00336           3*dX->drho.b*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00337         dq2->b[j] += q[i+j*3]*
00338           3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b*X->Q;
00339         for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00340           dq2->b[k] += q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00341       }
00342 
00343       merr = rho2cm;
00344 
00345       *q2 += - q[j+j*3]* merr* X->Q;
00346 
00347       for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00348         dq2->chi[k] += - q[j+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00349       dq2->a += - q[j+j*3]* (drho2cm.a* X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.a);
00350       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00351         dq2->b[k] += - q[j+j*3]* 
00352           (drho2cm.b[k]*X->Q + merr* dX->dQ.b[k]);
00353     }
00354   }
00355 }

00358 static void gob_quadrupoleoffd(quadrupolepara* q2par,
00359                                const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00360                                const GaussianAux* X, const gradGaussianAux* dX,
00361                                complex double* q2, gradGaussian* dq2)
00362 {
00363   double* Xcm = q2par->Xcm;
00364   double* q=q2par->q;
00365   int i,j, k;
00366   complex double merr;
00367 
00368   for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00369     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00370       if (i != j) {
00371 
00372         merr = 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j]);
00373       
00374         *q2 += q[i+j*3]* merr *X->Q;
00375 
00376         for (k=0; k<2; k++)
00377           dq2->chi[k] +=  q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.chi[k];
00378         dq2->a += q[i+j*3]*
00379           (3*(dX->drho.a[i]*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])+(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.a[j])*X->Q+
00380            merr* dX->dQ.a);
00381         dq2->b[i] += q[i+j*3]*
00382           3*dX->drho.b*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])*X->Q;
00383         dq2->b[j] += q[i+j*3]*
00384           3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])*dX->drho.b*X->Q;
00385         for (k=0; k<3; k++) 
00386           dq2->b[k] += q[i+j*3]* merr* dX->dQ.b[k];
00387       }
00388 }

00391 static void gcmob_equadrupole(const quadrupolepara* P,
00392                               const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00393                               const GaussianAux* X,
00394                               gradCM* dCMq2)
00395 {
00396   double* Xcm = P->Xcm;
00397   double* q = P->q;
00398   int i,j;
00399 
00400   if (G1->xi == 1) {
00401 
00402     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00403       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00404         dCMq2->X[i] -= q[i+j*3]* 3*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])* X->Q;
00405         dCMq2->X[j] -= q[i+j*3]* 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])* X->Q;
00406       }
00407       dCMq2->X[j] -= q[j+j*3]* 2*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])* X->Q;
00408     }
00409   }
00410 }
00411 
00412 
00413 static void gcmob_nquadrupole(const quadrupolepara* P,
00414                               const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00415                               const GaussianAux* X,
00416                               gradCM* dCMq2)
00417 {
00418   double* Xcm = P->Xcm;
00419   double* q = P->q;
00420   int i,j;
00421 
00422   if (G1->xi == -1) {
00423 
00424     for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00425       for (i=0; i<3; i++) {
00426         dCMq2->X[i] -= q[i+j*3]* 3*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])* X->Q;
00427         dCMq2->X[j] -= q[i+j*3]* 3*(X->rho[i]-Xcm[i])* X->Q;
00428       }
00429       dCMq2->X[j] -= q[j+j*3]* 2*(X->rho[j]-Xcm[j])* X->Q;
00430     }
00431   }
00432 }

00434 
00435 #define SQR(x) (x)*(x)
00436 
00437 void calcConstraintQ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00438                       double* q2)
00439 {
00440   double Xcm[3];
00441   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00442   int i;
00443 
00444   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00445 
00446   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupole};
00447 
00448   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00449 
00450   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00451     qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00452 
00453   *q2 = sqrt(qsq);
00454 }
00455

00457 void calcConstraintQ2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00458                         const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00459                         complex double *q)
00460 {
00461   double Xcm[3] = { 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 };
00462 
00463   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupole};
00464 
00465   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00466 }

00469 void calcConstraintEQ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00470                        double* q2)
00471 {
00472   double Xcm[3];
00473   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00474   int i;
00475 
00476   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00477 
00478   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_equadrupole};
00479 
00480   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00481 
00482   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00483     qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00484 
00485   *q2 = sqrt(qsq);

00501 void calcConstraintNQ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00502                        double* q2)
00503 {
00504   double Xcm[3];
00505   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00506   int i;
00507 
00508   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00509 
00510   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_nquadrupole};
00511 
00512   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00513 
00514   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00515     qsq += SQR(q[i]);

00532 
00533 void calcgradConstraintQ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00534                           const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00535                           gradSlaterDet* dq2)
00536 {
00537   double Xcm[3];
00538   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00539 
00540   int i;
00541   quadrupolepara q2par;
00542 
00543   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00544 
00545   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupole};
00546 
00547   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00548 
00549   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00550     qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00551   
00552   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00553     q2par.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];
00554   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00555     q2par.q[i] = q[i]/sqrt(qsq);
00556 
00557   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_q2 = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gob_quadrupole};
00558 
00559   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_q2, dq2);
00560 }
00561 
00562 
00563 void calcgradConstraintQ2od(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00564                             const SlaterDetAux* X,
00565                             const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00566                             const double* q,
00567                             gradSlaterDet* dq2)
00568 {
00569   double Xcm[3] = { 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 };
00570 
00571   int i;
00572   quadrupolepara q2par;
00573 
00574   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00575     q2par.q[i] = q[i];
00576 
00577   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_q2 = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gob_quadrupole};
00578 
00579   calcgradSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, dX, &gop_ob_q2, dq2);
00580 }
00581 
00582 
00583 void calcgradConstraintEQ2(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00584                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00585                            gradSlaterDet* dq2)
00586 {
00587   double Xcm[3];
00588   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00589 
00590   int i;
00591   quadrupolepara q2par;
00592 
00593   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00594 
00595   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_equadrupole};
00596 
00597   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00598 
00599   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00600     qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00601   
00602   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00603     q2par.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];
00604   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00605     q2par.q[i] = q[i]/sqrt(qsq);
00606 
00607   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_q2 = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gob_equadrupole};
00608 
00609   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_q2, dq2);
00610 
00611   OneBodyOperator gcmop_ob_q2 = {dim: 6, opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gcmob_equadrupole};
00612 
00613   calcgradCMSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gcmop_ob_q2, dq2);
00614   dq2->val = sqrt(qsq);
00615 }

00709 
00710 
00711 static double det(double R[3][3])
00712 {
00713   return (R[0][0]*R[1][1]*R[2][2] + R[0][1]*R[1][2]*R[2][0] + 
00714           R[0][2]*R[1][0]*R[2][1] - R[0][0]*R[1][2]*R[2][1] - 
00715           R[0][1]*R[1][0]*R[2][2] - R[0][2]*R[1][1]*R[2][0]);
00716 }
00717 
00718 
00719 void calcConstraintDetQ(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00720                         double* detq)
00721 {
00722   double Xcm[3];
00723   double q[9];
00724 
00725   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00726 
00727   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupole};
00728 
00729   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00730 
00731   *detq = cbrt(det(q));
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00735 static void adjunct(const double q[3][3], double a[3][3])
00736 {
00737   int i,j;
00738 
00739   for (j=0; j<3; j++)
00740     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00741       a[i][j] = 
00742         q[(j+1)%3][(i+1)%3]*q[(j+2)%3][(i+2)%3]-
00743         q[(j+1)%3][(i+2)%3]*q[(j+2)%3][(i+1)%3];
00744 }
00745 
00746 
00747 void calcgradConstraintDetQ(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00748                             const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00749                             gradSlaterDet* ddetq)
00750 {
00751   double Xcm[3];
00752   double q[9], detq, adjq[9];
00753 
00754   int i;
00755   quadrupolepara q2par;
00756 
00757   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00758 
00759   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupole};
00760 
00761   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00762 
00763   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00764     q2par.Xcm[i] = Xcm[i];
00765 
00766   detq = det(q);
00767   adjunct(q, adjq);
00768 
00769   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00770     q2par.q[i] = 1.0/(3*SQR(cbrt(detq)))*adjq[i];
00771 
00772   gradOneBodyOperator gop_ob_detq = {opt: 1, par: &q2par, me: gob_quadrupole};
00773 
00774   calcgradSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, dX, &gop_ob_detq, ddetq);
00775   ddetq->val = cbrt(detq);
00776 }
00777 
00778 
00779 double outputConstraintDetQ(double val)
00780 {
00781   return 3*val;
00782 }
00783 
00784 
00785 
00786 void calcConstraintQ2offdiagonal(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00787                                  double* q2)
00788 {
00789   double Xcm[3];
00790   double q[9], qsq = 0.0;
00791   int i;
00792 
00793   calcCMPosition(Q, X, Xcm);
00794 
00795   OneBodyOperator op_ob_q = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Xcm, me: ob_quadrupoleoffd};
00796 
00797   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_q, q);
00798 
00799   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00800     qsq += SQR(q[i]);
00801 
00802   *q2 = sqrt(qsq);
00803 }
